title: Reinforced Greatsword
content:
Reinforced Greatsword Common 2~12 Damage 2d6 Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This cumbersome blade looks strong enough to survive journey through all nine Hells. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 65
